migrateuseraccount-desc: The description for the extension displayed on Special:Version.
migrateuseraccount-loginprompt: The prompt displayed to users when visiting the login or create account pages.
migrateuseraccount-error-loggedin: The error displayed to users who are already logged in.
migrateuseraccount-error-user-invalid: The error displayed to users who try to migrate an account that cannot be migrated.
migrateuseraccount-help: The help text displayed on Special:MigrateUserAccount, providing guidance on how to use the page.
migrateuseraccount-form-password-help: The help text displayed on the password field.
migrateuseraccount-token-title:
The text which provides the user with a unique token.
Parameters:
* $1 - Username
* $2 - Token
migrateuseraccount-token-help:
The text displayed to users to guide them on how to verify their account on the external wiki.
Parameters:
* $1 - URL for the external wiki
migrateuseraccount-token-button: The text displayed on the button users click to confirm they have completed the verification steps
migrateuseraccount-token-no-token:
The error displayed to users if no token was found on the external wiki's page.
Parameters:
* $1 - User page link
migrateuseraccount-token-no-recent-edit:
The error displayed to users if the external wiki page has not been edited in over 10 minutes.
Parameters:
* $1 - User page link
migrateuseraccount-token-username-no-mat:
The error displayed to users if the last edit to the external wiki page was made by a different user.
Parameters:
* $1 - User page link
migrateuseraccount-form-password: The text used on the form label for the password field.
migrateuseraccount-form-confirm-password: The text used on the form label for the confirm password field.
migrateuseraccount-form-username: The text used on the form label for the username field.
migrateuseraccount-form-username-help: The help text used on the form label for the username field.
migrateuseraccount-migrated-log-entry: The text used on the public log entry when a user migrates their account.
migrateuseraccount-success:
The message displayed when the account migration is successful.
Parameters:
* $1 - Username
migrateuseraccount-failed: The generic error message displayed if the account migration was not successful.
migrateuseraccount-invalid-password: The error message displayed if the new password does not meet the wiki's requirements.
migrateuseraccount-wrong-confirm-passwor: The error message displayed if the entered new password and confirmation of new password do not match.
migrateuseraccount-invalid-username: The error message displayed if the new username entered is invalid or is in use.
